name: Conway's Game of Life
description: A simple, randomly-initialized game of life. Click to generate a new simulation. Greens are healthy, reds are sick, and blues are babies.

name: Game of Life God Mode
description: Good ol' game of life, but you're God. Click or drag the mouse to create life in a cell. Greens are healthy, reds are sick, and blues are babies.

name: Flow Field
description: Colored flow field. Double-click to save it as an image to your computer. Almost all parameters are random.

name: Organic Flow Field
description: Flow field paired with perlin noise to make the strands look more organic.

name: A field of lines
description: Nearly everything here is utilizing Perlin noise. Guess what those things are...

name: Heat Map
description: A shifting heat map. Click to increase resolution. Press any key to decrease it.

name: Perlin Noise Scales
description: A bunch of cubes rotating and changing shade using Perlin noise, which creates a scaly texture.

name: Calling Void
description: Try to figure out how this was made :)

name: Tree Rings
description: Ever chopped down a tree? Don't do it. But when you do, the surface inside of the trunk may look like this...
